name: Lord of the Hunt
description: The Lord of the Hunt is a formidable fey creature with exceptional strength and dexterity, embodying the spirit of the hunt. It typically wields a spear and longbow, utilizing magical weaponry.
memorable: Equipped with magical weapon attacks that inflict additional poison damage, it can summon beasts to assist in combat and charm opponents with its hunting horn.
goals: To lead hunts and command respect on the battlefield, utilizing strategy to achieve its objectives.
relations: Often associated with other fey creatures or beasts, it commands loyalty from summoned animals.
environment: Typically found in forested or natural areas where it can effectively manage its hunting endeavors.
strengths: Possesses high physical attributes, immunity to cold and poison damage, and legendary resistance enhancing survivability.
weaknesses: May struggle against opponents who excel in maneuverability or clever tactics.
attacks: Utilizes multiattacks with spear or longbow that can teleport the spear back to its hand, and deals significant poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Huntsman’s Weapons, allowing its magical weapon attacks to inflict an extra 14 poison damage.
equipment: Wields a magical spear and longbow.
senses: Blindsight up to 10 feet and a high passive perception of 20.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Perception, and Survival, reflecting its connection to nature and the hunt.
additional_information: Immune to conditions such as exhaustion and charmed.
Can summon a magical Fey mount that shares its resistances and immunities.
The Call to the Hunt allows charming a creature within 60 feet.
Resists nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from attacks unless made with cold iron.
Uses Parry reaction to enhance defensive capabilities.
test_queries: poison dealing fey with magical weapons
strong tactical fey that leads hunts
